nodes.label: let st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;
st . admin = ctx . accounts . admin . key () ;
let st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;

if st . used < st . burst_len { token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . src_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . dst_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . admin . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_tokens) ? ; st . used = st . used . saturating_add (1) ; }

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . src_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . dst_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . admin . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_tokens) ? ;

if st . used >= st . burst_len { system_program :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , SysTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . receiver . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . lamports) ? ; }

system_program :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , SysTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . receiver . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . lamports) ? ;
